item.name: Lady Bay Vineyard
item.address1: Cnr Vine & Willis Drive, Lady Bay, SA 5204
item.description: Lady Bay has cabernet sauvignon (3.64ha), shiraz (3ha), tempranillo (1.2ha), viognier (0.4ha) and tempranillo (0.3ha) a mere 500m from the waters of the Gulf of St Vincent. On the inland side it is protected by the Great Gorge, part of the southern Mount Lofty Ranges. Cool days and warm nights provide good ripening conditions, even for varieties such as cabernet sauvignon.
